para.remark: Section 2.1 in the VSIPL 1.4 specification will not be changed.
Section 2.2 in the VSIPL 1.4 specification will not be changed.
Section 2.3 in the VSIPL 1.4 specification will not be changed.
Section 2.5 in the VSIPL 1.4 specification will be renumbered as section 2.7; no other changes will take place.
Section 2.6 in the VSIPL 1.4 specification will be renumbered as section 2.8; no other changes will take place.
Section 2.7 in the VSIPL 1.4 specification will be renumbered as section 2.9; no other changes will take place.
Section 2.8 in the VSIPL 1.4 specification will be renumbered as section 2.10; no other changes will take place.
Section 2.9 in the VSIPL 1.4 specification will be renumbered as section 2.11; no other changes will take place.
